sarkas.potentials.egs module¶

Module for handling EGS Potential as described in Ref. [Stanton2015]

sarkas.potentials.egs.EGS_force_PP(r, pot_matrix)[source]¶

Calculates Potential and force between particles using the EGS Potential.

Parameters

  • r (float) – Particles’ distance.

  • pot_matrix (array) – EGS potential parameters.

Returns

  • U (float) – Potential.

  • fr (float) – Force.

sarkas.potentials.egs.update_params(potential, params)[source]¶

Create potential dependent simulation’s parameters.

Parameters

params (object) – Simulation’s parameters
